window_title: IPTV → Emby M3U (Sort / Logo Check / Stream Check / Project)
preview_placeholder: Generated M3U content will appear here…
bulk_tip:
One channel per line:
  - URL only: http://... or rtmp://... etc.
  - Or: Channel|URL|Group|LogoURL
  - Or: Channel,URL,Group,LogoURL
Blank lines and # comments are ignored.
bulk_placeholder: Paste your IPTV address list here…
msg_new_confirm: Current project has unsaved changes. Create new and discard?
msg_no_import_detail: No valid rows found (possibly all blank lines/comments).
msg_no_channel: No usable channels found in this M3U.
msg_import_mode: Current list is not empty. Choose import mode:
msg_replace_confirm: Current project has unsaved changes. Replace and discard?
msg_missing_dep_detail:
requests library not found. Stream checking is unavailable.

Please run: pip install requests
msg_no_content_detail: No valid channel URLs to export.
msg_close_save:
Project has unsaved changes. Save?
Yes = Save  No = Don't save  Cancel = Cancel
err_invalid_magic: Not a valid project file (MAGIC mismatch)
